archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Make Product Offering Purchase Choice
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Choose a product offering to purchase or create a customized product offering.

properties.value: Make Product Offering Purchase Choice chooses a product offering to purchase or creates a customized product offering. A customized offering may be a bundle and is based on rules defined for creating the customized offering. A price for the customized offering may also be determined (not chosen). The choice may also include one of the recommended product offerings provided.
